summary: This is a U.S. Customs and Border Protection record showing passport information for Jeffrey Edward Epstein. It indicates his passport was issued on September 12, 2012, and was set to expire on May 26, 2020.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Edward Epstein's U.S. passport was issued on September 12, 2012, and was valid until May 26, 2020.
The document is a U.S. Customs and Border Protection record generated on April 26, 2019.
Epstein is identified as a male U.S. citizen born on January 20, 1953.
